amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow the National Ocean Council, operating under Executive Order 13547, to develop a process for decommissioning oil and gas rigs that eliminate harm to the red snapper stock and improve habitat.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 114-128 to allow the National Ocean Council, operating under Executive Order 13547, to develop a process for decommissioning oil and gas rigs that eliminates harm to the red snapper stock and improves habitat.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 227 (Roll no. 265).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Lowenthal.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 227 (Roll no. 265).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
